description: Duo is a member of the scavenger organisation known as the Sweeper Group, which sent him to Earth to battle Oz. Despite the hardships he`s suffered in his young life, and the seriousness of his mission, Duo is always cheerful and good-natured. But when he goes into battle as pilot of the Gundam Deathscythe, striking from the shadows with its lethal beam scythe, he truly earns his nickname "God of Death."
name: Duo Maxwell
